website_summaries.verdict: This kit is perfect for someone just beginning jewelry making, as it has everything one needs to get started, and it comes at a steal.
pros: Kit contains a wide variety of beads to choose from while creating jewelry pieces
Has 2 different types of wire as well as elastic
Includes a wide range of clasps
cons: Colors of included items may appear different in person than they do online

customer_reviews.title: Missing several items
customer_reviews.text: My order was missing all the wire and tools, all accessories. I was glad to order the item to get the extra accessories bit very disappointed when I received only a few findings in the plastic box. I'm not sure why or how this occurred.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Great jewelry materials, but the tools..... Different story. My pliers were stuck together and had definitely been used before. There are scratches and dings all over it. Not to mention rusty spots. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlin Miron

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Upon Arrival!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received the package since most of the pieces were not in the compartmentalized container. I didn't open the bag yet because it was a turn off receiving it so shabby. I have not verified quantity yet, since I haven't decided If I want to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: V Wms In FL

customer_reviews.title: Quantity Is Embarrassingly Low
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed with the quantity. The count is nowhere near the promised count. For example the product says it has 70 screw eye pin, but the product came with just 31 of it. 35 lobster clasps, but the product had only 21. 250 jump rings, but product had only 74! Can you beat that? Especially when jump ring is something that is used most frequently. And this is only a few of them. Pretty sure if I count others, it would not meet the promised number.
customer_reviews.author: Bhavyatha

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she was very surprised with all of the different varieties of clasps and everything in the case. She said she could use all of the items included. She would definitely recommend this for the beginner beader, as she is a beginner herself. There are enough items to make complete bracelets and necklaces included in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality.  Regret Purchasing.  Would Like to Return.
customer_reviews.text: Having been beading for a number of years, I thought I could ascertain the quality of this product sight unseen. The fact that it was Amazon's Choice also led me to expect quality. I was vastly disappointed. The wire, findings and case were all substandard. I was not expecting all components to be so cheaply made. I will not be able to use these items with the exception of the pliers. Oddly, this was a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Lili DiVita

customer_reviews.title: Good steal
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with product. Container was smaller than I thought but that’s actually better and more convenient. All the tools work and all the pieces accounted for. Good price for what you get. There was some grass of herb of some sort in one of the bags but other then that it was good.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great set, just smaller than you think!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great set with great tools, but the eyepins are maybe half an inch long. They work great, just are shorter than I thought they would be. Also, the clasps are a little touchy, but I've made several pieces and the clasps still work just fine. They just don't have the same spring as some others and sometimes you have to close it manually. Overall, can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Emeralds357

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit with terrific variety!!
customer_reviews.text: Best jewelry repair kit I found! Excellent variety of items and three metal colors. Two types of earring backs, three spools of elastic, earring wires, claws etc. includes a cool little ring for opening jump rings. Only slight drawback is the bright yellow color of the gold items. Some loose pieces jumped the box dividers and were slightly mixed up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but has major flaws.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue is that I received different, less narrow pliers than pictures and, while they were still usable for my project, I would have had an easier time with better pliers. The metal materials are good quality, but the tools accompanying the supplies aren't worth bothering with. I got this kit because it saved a lot of effort when it came to gathering all the materials I needed for my project—however I wish I would have just gotten the pliers and materials separately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: handy to have when a clasp breaks or you lose the back of an earring.
customer_reviews.text: handy to have when a clasp breaks or you lose the back of an earring. until youre in a spot where you have nothing to fix your favorite necklace with or are in a hurry to get to work or an appointment and cant find an earring back, you wont miss not having this kit, but the moment you do you will be wondering why you didnt order it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I won’t get this again. I’m big on jewelry that doesn’t rust. The metal wires and other metal parts rusted too quickly and ruined some beads from bracelets I had. A big no for me. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: foreignmex

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for most. I found I ran out of silver wire first. Would like a few more necklace or stone findings too. Maybe just more leads at POS for add ons.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Great,  Complete kit !
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great kit ! Be creative, one trip to the beach then your imagination will help you create your own personalized nautical jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Island Time

customer_reviews.title: the butterfly earring backs are too small/ tight
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price of this set, and it does come with a lot! Unfortunately, I was basically buying it for the earring backs and was very disappointed: I don't like the kind with the plastic pad, and the butterfly type don't fit on any of my earrings! The are too tight, or the hole is too small, maybe. I'm using the other kind of back with the plastic pad, but not loving them feel of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry findings and tools
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and am happy with it. I am learning jewelry making and this helps me begin my new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hauff

customer_reviews.title: Great value, perfect for beginners and experienced jewelers alike
customer_reviews.text: I have only used a few pieces so far and am very impressed. I make epoxy jewelery and needed this for attaching eyelets and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive jewelry findings kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for finishing out small shell jewelry items. I gave it a 4 star rating as the jump rings are really small and therefore not usable for my projrct.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Found better quality at Walmart, Jo Ann fabric, hobby lobby and Michaels. Also at comparable prices
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for all you get, the wire is excellent quality. The tools that come with it are great also.
customer_reviews.author: Weeping Willow

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I bought it to fix some on my jewelry (specially my necklaces since I wear a lot). It’s a good purchase, I’m thinking of starting to make my own jewelry since I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Micaela Morcillo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Came with everything pictures and is very easy to use. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Shadday

customer_reviews.title: love this jewelry kit
customer_reviews.text: Great product..Many little facets to work with.. And fix your own costume jewelry..
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Horton

customer_reviews.title: School project
customer_reviews.text: My daughter at grade 4 used this kit and model magic to create multiple ornaments for a school event .. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: vivek nag

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set. Note that the gold items are bright yellow gold.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Set. Note that the gold items are bright yellow gold. The silver tone is NOT the white silver of sets from other distributors. I like this silver color better as it is more likely to stay this color longer term.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Not a good find...
customer_reviews.text: I likes it delivered less than a week and few items I like are the elastic string for bracelets and the pliers the rest of the items like jewelry accessories findings its not what I expected it just too tiny, very small. Its for kids staff projects and the product for earring findings is not a very well made coated its fade once you pliers it... :/
customer_reviews.author: gsflorida54

customer_reviews.title: Some parts are okay some are horrible
customer_reviews.text: The eye pins are very short! So short that they aren’t working for my project. They are only 20 mm. The tweezers are flimsy and don’t work well either. I am kinda disappointed in this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of those "you get what you pay for" type of product. It's just poor quality. The ear peaces easily bend and everything just feels very cheap. It's an alright product definitely worth the money you pay for it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Six weeks shipping from China
customer_reviews.text: Amazon needs to make clear the country products are shipped from. During these Covid times, shipping from overseas is taking forever, especially from China. As far as the product goes, it’s as good as any cheap Chinese jewelry parts. It’s a good selection for repairing costume jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of parts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit to be able to repair my wife's and granddaughters necklaces. It has all the parts that I have needed so far.
customer_reviews.author: steve nicks

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety.
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of fasteners. It's a decent box to get started with.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Great variety. So so quality jump rings
customer_reviews.text: Great variety! Did not have amount told and jump rings are very fragile do not tug hard they come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Casey C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: These items are very miniature and a waste. The string pops and very weak. Not satified at all. The best item is the pilers. I could brought a set of these for less than the amount paid for whole set.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, my tweezers were bent. I love the different color options though. Overall, it got the job done
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Afzali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice selection for my start in making jewelry. Very good quality. Better than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RF-Eng

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, it has worked out perfectly for me! Plus i love the plastic container!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome, it comes with all the jewelry repair items I will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: G. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: Craft Experiment
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try to making lava bracelets and this was an addition to the other kit I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Suse P

customer_reviews.title: Tarnished fast
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for the price when I got them, but I’ve worn a necklace 4 times and the gold clasp and gold jump rings have turned completely tarnished. :( Definitely can’t sell an item made with these. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DeconstructingVenus

customer_reviews.title: Start up findings and tools.
customer_reviews.text: Nice combination set for beginners or for intermediate that want better tools and findings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to see everything I would need to do jewelry repair (the reason I got it) and making new pieces. Price was right also.
customer_reviews.author: Scooze

customer_reviews.title: Tweezers were missing
customer_reviews.text: The tweezers pictured in this set were missing from mine. I tried to contact the manufacturer and let them know so they could replace them, but I haven't heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen R.

customer_reviews.title: Useful kit
customer_reviews.text: This contains a lot of useful pieces and the tools needed to fix jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer j ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use for selling jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty happy with how much the kit came with, however as I was using more of it I noticed many of the gold earring hooks finish was coming off and some were incomplete. Given the price, I guess you get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Misleading. The pliers shown are not the one that come.
customer_reviews.author: Valia

customer_reviews.title: Missing tools
customer_reviews.text: There were no wires or pliers or tools other than what came in the plastic container with this order as the picture shows
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like all the choices included in this kit. As I am a active prospector, i make some of my own creations.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, but it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to do repairs. Everything I needed and more.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Estes

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase I got everything that is advertised and on time.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for new, or novice, jewelry makers or repairs.
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter and I started a jewelry project to make some $ at a weekly handmade goods market. This box was the perfect starter kit! Silver, gold and Bronze ring overs give me the options I need for different pendants, the needle nose pliers are great quality, and it has a measuring tool, and a bonus of silver and gold wire, and beading string. Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: The Dawg Lady

customer_reviews.title: Only received half of what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t know if it was easy to use because half of the order was missing when I received it. I have requested a replacement, but I’m not hopeful. If the replacement order is not in its entirety, then I will return it and give it another bad review. However if I get what I ordered, I’ll take this review down. People want to get what they paid for not half an order.
customer_reviews.author: RoSa

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile kit!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has a bit of everything and a convenient case!! I absolutely love it!!! This kit is perfect for beginners and experienced jewelry makers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Has Everything Youll Need
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. 99% of what you'll need to fix your jewelry will be included in this set at least that's how its been for me. I've used it to repair several of my grandmas old jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: The Bevers

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hooks for jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I cant wait to get my older jewelry out and begin fixing my clasps. Now i cant say yet about the quality of these clasps snd tools but they look good
customer_reviews.author: Paul Fielitz

customer_reviews.title: Could use more variety of threads.
customer_reviews.text: there are wires and elastic but no regular thread. It's impossible to make necklaces with the metal wires that don't look clunky. Overall nice starter pack. I would buy more types of threads and pendant connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great supplies.
customer_reviews.text: Great supplies for jewelry making for a great price. Love the needle nose pliers in addition. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: QueenofCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not 1 complaint. Whether this is a starter kit or a repair kit;its worth every penny! Are there a few broken/misshapen pieces,yes but its expected with anything in bulk. Out of hhe whole set,3 hooks were missing a piece.
customer_reviews.author: MadameK

customer_reviews.title: Kit supplies items to use for Jewelry making.
customer_reviews.text: This kit will provide a beginner beader or an experienced beader all the supplies necessary to complete their project.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Leslie Coxon

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: Received package with half of the tools missing. Sent it back for a replacement and it was missing all of the tools this time around. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit and all of the tool I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: All of the items worked it was exciting to fix jewlery that I had not been able to wear for some time! Great stuff! Thanks for the suggested items we needed them all at one point or another! Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: craft kits
customer_reviews.text: great craft kits for jewelry i love making my own earrings and necklaces
customer_reviews.author: wildmom

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money! Fixes everything!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to fix one thing, then it fixed 7 pieces I had! I was surprised by all the extras and tools !
customer_reviews.author: Sea Ello

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome but a little more wire would be better for big projects
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Item was shipped as requested
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good price for jewelry kit
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my niece. I have not heard anything about it. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Morton

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product.. Love everything in their package! Still buying in this store and the brand
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: No More Lost Earrings
customer_reviews.text: When I think of all the necklaces and earrings I’ve lost due to a broken clasp, I cringe. That’s because this inexpensive kit would have fixed them all. Who knew! I recommend this kit to anyone who has jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: aakitkat

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Just a really great set at a really great value.
customer_reviews.author: Paper Poppet

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Pliers broke with one use. Other jewelry pieces did not hold together well.
customer_reviews.author: Winona G.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Although the jump rings are not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Although the jump rings are not reliable. BUT this is a very very handy kit to have.
customer_reviews.author: Celest Carsner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The string is really weak.. but maybe if I knew about string sizes, I woulda been ok.
customer_reviews.author: Aniesha

product_meta.title: Paxcoo Jewelry Making Supplies Kit - Jewelry Repair Tools with Accessories Jewelry Pliers Findings and Beading Wires for Adult and Beginners
product_meta.description:
Paxcoo jewelry making supplies kit with jewelry findings accessories and beading wires are fit for professionals and starters on jewelry making and jewelry repair. This tools and accessories set includes all you need to begin with making earrings, necklaces, bracelets, charms and other DIY projects. 

Product Feature:


Jewelry tools:

- Flat nose pliers are ideal for forming wire, wrapping wire, opening and closing jump rings, closing bead tips and attaching findings

- Tweezers can help you easily pick up tinny jewelry findings

- Plastic caliper is used for measuring the diameter, thickness and length of the object

- Jump rings opener tool helps you open and close the jump rings easily 

Jewelry wires:

- The silver and gold beading wires are made of copper and they are 0.4 mm in diameter, 10 m in length 

- The crystal elastic stretch string is made of elastic polyester and it is 1 mm in diameter, 10 m in length 

Package Included:

- 1 * Flat Nose Pliers 
- 1 * Tweezers 
- 1 * Plastic Caliper 
- 1 * Jump Ring Opener Tool 
- 1 * Roll of Crystal String 
- 2 * Roll of Beading Wire (Silver and Gold) 
- 60 * Lobster Clasps (6*12mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 60 * Earring Hooks (20mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 150 * Eye Pins (22mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 90 * Screw Eye Pins (5*10mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 90 * Ribbon Ends (10mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 120 * Cord Ends (3*6mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 240 * Open Jump Rings (5mm, Silver, Gold and Bronze) 
- 30 * Bullet Clutch Earring Backs with Pad (Gold) 
- 100 * Clear Rubber Bullet Earring Backs 
- 60 * Butterfly Sharp Earring Backs (Bronze) 
- 1 * 24 Grids Plastic Jewelry Box
feature_bullets: WHAT YOU GET? – Paxcoo jewelry making supplies includes chain nose jewelry pliers, jump ring opener, tweezers, plastic caliper, crystal string, silver beading wire, gold beading wire and a box of 24 styles silver jewelry findings. You can use this set to make or repair your necklace, bracelet and other crafting job

JEWELRY FINDINGS ACCESSARY – The jewelry making findings come with lobster clasps, earring hooks, eye pins, screw eye pins, ribbon ends, cord ends, open jump rings, earring backs, all these jewelry findings are in silver, gold and bronze color. Totally 1000 pieces jewelry findings that stored in a 24 grids plastic jewelry organizer box, neat and orderly

BEADING WIRES FOR DIY CRAFTS – The jewelry wire set comes with 3 rolls of beading wires: 1 roll of crystal elastic stretch string, 1 roll of silver beading wire, 1 roll of gold beading wire. These are the necessities of making bracelets, necklaces, earrings, charms, hair accessories and other DIY projects

A MUST HAVE KIT FOR JEWELRY CRAFT – The jewelry making kits are fit for professionals as well as a starter on jewelry craft and jewelry repair. It is a great kit that fit for beading, jewelry repair and fashionable jewelry making
NOTE – If you have any problem for our product, you can click “seller contact” button in your Amazon account to contact us. We will be delighted to help you and reply as soon as we can

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars487 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
